events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at a busy intersection. Immediate claim filing initiated due to significant damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after confirming vehicle damage and collision details.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to assist the customer through the vehicle accident claim process.
Acknowledgment of claim receipt was sent to the customer, reassuring them that the case is being actively handled.
The agent requested the customer to provide photos of vehicle damage, police report, and a copy of the driving license for investigation.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and insurance policy details.
Investigation opened to verify collision circumstances and evaluate the extent of the vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming the customerâ€™s liability was minimal and damage was consistent with reported accident.
A settlement amount was proposed covering repair costs and rental vehicle reimbursement during repair period.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt response and clarity offered regarding the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved after customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customer's account covering all approved expenses.
The claim was successfully closed following full payment and confirmation of vehicle repairs completed.
